title: Game crashed won't let me reconnect please help
body: Hi there, was playing a bot game, didnt load in, client crashed, i press the reconnect button but it won't let me in, just keeps at it, restarted computer, router, modem, no firewalls or vpn, nothing blocking my connection, no packet losses etc, stable ping, am currently running repair to see what the problem is. pls halp ty

replies.body:
Hey glad to hear everything is okay now!  If the crash was followed by a bugsplat error, then a bad game file or even drivers could be the cause.  I'm glad repairing fixed this up for you!  

Leaverbuster will only apply on your account with a history of leaves, not just one game.  Keep playing without anymore leaves and your standing with the system will improve!
100% works if you use repair after this happens.
I did the repair, logged in, got a leaver buster out of a bot game just now? You guys need to work on some stuff man. gonna try to start up another one to test what happens.
